text: Question 3. (4 points) Consider the dataset below, which has 5 training examples and 1 feature: 5 1 3 —0.5 X=14|, y=|-02]. 2 0 1 —0.1 (a) Suppose we want to fit a degree p = 2 polynomial to this dataset. Write a feature matrix Z that we could we use in a linear regression model to fit such a quadratic model?
